name: Delve (itch) (REDACTED GAMES STUDIO)
description:
You play as an old adventurer who seeks one last quest before he perishes. 

Your goal is to find Chanir; an ancient giant known for destroying worlds.

This is a submission to the scribble jam.

Theme - Scribble/doodle

("Doodle" pixel art style)

Challenge - All text must be a made up language

(I made glyphs as my made up language)

*WARNING: THIS GAME IS VERY HARD BUT VERY FUN*

Controls

left - A

Right - D

Jump - space

Mid air teleport (Hidden green rune must be active) - W

Engine - 

Gamemaker studio 2 desktop

To find the green rune stone push the box on the lever and go right.

This is my first ever game jam and the first ever game I have released to the public.

Enjoy!
